potions.name: Potion of Vitality
potions.description: A potion to bring you back to health and get you back in the fight. Heals any wound or illness. Tastes like strawberries!

potions.name: Potion of Strength
potions.description: A potion to give you the strength to face any challenge head-on. Grants incredible physical strength.

potions.name: Potion of Haste
potions.description: A potion for when you need to move fast. Increases your movement speed.

potions.name: Potion of Invisibility
potions.description: A potion for when you want to stay out of sight. Grants temporary invisibility.

potions.name: Potion of Intellect
potions.description: A potion to think through any problem. Greatly enhances thinking processes and awareness to transcendant levels! This one is a favorite of wizard apprentices.

potions.name: Potion of Fortitude
potions.description: A potion for when you need to face an unstopable force. Grants incredible durability, making the user nearly invincible (be wary of High-Dark Warlock and Imp Overlord magic).
